org.microbean.helm.maven

Class AbstractReleaseEvent

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.util.EventObject
      • org.microbean.helm.maven.AbstractReleaseEvent
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Serializable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    ReleaseContentEvent, ReleaseDiscoveryEvent, ReleaseHistoryEvent, ReleaseStatusEvent, ReleaseTestEvent

    public abstract class AbstractReleaseEvent
extends EventObject
    An EventObject describing a meaningful event in the life of a Helm release.
    Author:
    Laird Nelson
    See Also:
    EventObject, Serialized Form

    • Constructor Detail

      • AbstractReleaseEvent

        protected AbstractReleaseEvent(AbstractReleaseMojo source)
        Creates a new AbstractReleaseEvent.
        Parameters:
        source - the AbstractReleaseMojo responsible for firing the event; must not be null
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - if source is null; thrown by the EventObject.EventObject(Object) constructor

    • Method Detail

      • getLog

        public final Log getLog()
        Returns the Log that may be used to log information.

        This method may return null.

        Returns:
        the Log that may be used to log information, or null

      • getSource

        public AbstractReleaseMojo getSource()
        Overrides the EventObject.getSource() method to cast its return type to an AbstractReleaseMojo.

        This method never returns null.

        Overrides of this method must not return null.

        Overrides:
        getSource in class EventObject
        Returns:
        the AbstractReleaseMojo implementation that fired this event; never null
